doc:
Lucy Grantham https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lucy_Grantham 0 Lucy Grantham aka Lucy Grunther (born October 13, 1951) is a former American actress, stage manager, and costumer. She is best known for her role as Phyllis Stone in Wes Craven's controversial horror film The Last House on the Left (1972). Her other films include the drama film Southern Hospitality (1971) and the documentary Loops (1973). Lucy_Grantham_aka_Lucy_Grunther ( born October_13_,_1951 ) is a_former_American_actress , stage_manager , and costumer . She is_best_known for her_role as Phyllis_Stone in Wes_Craven 's_controversial_horror_film The_Last_House on the_Left_(_1972_) . Her_other_films include the_drama_film_Southern_Hospitality ( 1971_) and the_documentary Loops (_1973_) .
